definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血壓及胃酸過多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期間禁用。

sentences.english: A 42-year-old woman was admitted with hypotension.
sentences.chinese: 一位42歲的女性因低血壓入院。

sentences.english: Dr. Alderman says that eating less salt results in lower bloodpresserpressure.
sentences.chinese: 奧德曼教授說少喫鹽的結果會導致低血壓。

sentences.english: Conclusions Acarbose is effective and comparatively safe to the elderly with postprandial hypotension.
sentences.chinese: 結論阿卡波糖治療老年人餐後低血壓安全有效。

sentences.english: Patients placed in the sitting position for a surgical procedure may become hypotensive, especially if hypovolemic.
sentences.chinese: 作爲手術的病人容易發生低血壓，特別是容量不足時。

sentences.english: The risk of fall was increased in subjects with low postprandial SBP.
sentences.chinese: 出現餐後低血壓的老人發生跌倒的風險明顯增加。

sentences.english: The treatment of hemodialysis-induced hypotension based on TCM syndrome differentiation was explored.
sentences.chinese: 探討血透相關性低血壓的中醫辨證治療策略。

sentences.english: In the absence of hypotension, vasodilators are recommended for most patients with AHF as first line therapy.
sentences.chinese: AHF不伴低血壓患者的一線治療藥物爲血管擴張劑。

sentences.english: What distinction do low blood pressure and hypoglycemia have?
sentences.chinese: 低血壓和低血糖有什麼區別？

sentences.english: RBV measurement may also help predict the appearance of symptomatic hypotension.
sentences.chinese: 監測RBV變化有助於預報血透低血壓的發生。

sentences.english: The opposite happens when the baroreceptors and brain detect low blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 當壓力感受器和大腦發現低血壓時，相反的發生。

sentences.english: Transient reversible hypotension may occur in cases of accidental overdosage.
sentences.chinese: 瞬態可逆的低血壓可能發生在意外過量的情況。

sentences.english: There was no difference in the frequency of hypotension or bradycardia between the groups.
sentences.chinese: 兩組中低血壓和心動過緩發生的頻率是沒有區別的。

sentences.english: Clinical prevention and treatment of hemodialysis associated with hypotension .
sentences.chinese: 血液透析併發低血壓反應的臨牀防治。

sentences.english: How do the high school student hypotension handle?
Hypotension should use with moderate amount to avoid hypersomnia.
sentences.chinese: 低血壓患者請適量使用，以免反應遲鈍想睡覺。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
